com.tapsterrock.mpx
Class BaseCalendar

java.lang.Object
  |
  +--com.tapsterrock.mpx.MPXRecord
        |
        +--com.tapsterrock.mpx.BaseCalendar
public class BaseCalendar
extends com.tapsterrock.mpx.MPXRecord

This class represents the Base Calendar Definition record. It is used to define the working and non-working days of the week. The default calendar defined Monday to Friday as working days.

Method Detail

addBaseCalendarException

public BaseCalendarException addBaseCalendarException()
                                               throws MPXException
Used to add exceptions to the calendar. The MPX standard defines a limit of 250 exceptions per calendar.
Returns:
BaseCalendarException
Throws:
MPXException - if limit on number of exceptions is reached

                                               throws MPXException

Parameters:

Returns:

Throws:
MPXException - if limit on number of exceptions is reached

addBaseCalendarHours

public BaseCalendarHours addBaseCalendarHours()
                                       throws MPXException
Used to add working hours to the calendar. Note that the MPX file definitiona allows a maximum of 7 calendar hours records to be added to a single calendar.
Returns:
BaseCalendarHours
Throws:
MPXException - if maximum number of records is exceeded

isWorkingDay

public boolean isWorkingDay(int day)
                     throws MPXException
Method indicating whether a day is a working or non-working day.
Parameters:
day - number of required day (1=Sunday, 7=Saturday)
Returns:
true if this is a working day
Throws:
MPXException - when an invalid day is specified

                                 throws MPXException
This is a convenience method used to add a default set of calendar hours to a calendar.
Throws:

getDuration

public MPXDuration getDuration(java.util.Date startDate,
                               java.util.Date endDate)
                        throws MPXException
This method is provided to allow an absolute period of time represented by start and end dates into a duration in working days based on this calendar instance.
Parameters:
startDate - start of the period
endDate - end of the period
Returns:
new MPXDuration object
Throws:
MPXException - if an invalid day is specified
